column4: I need to back some stuff from an infected Win 2000 computer over an ethernet link. Can I use a Gutsy LiveCD, or should I use a Hardy Beta? Or Knoppix, SystemRescue?
you can use the livecd for that
thanks Jack_Sparrow. I haven't used ClamAv to actually remove a virus before, but I guess trying would be a learning experience
thanks, I've used knoppix before for this, but haven't dealt with ntfs before
